General.Name: Ningbo ZhongDa Leader Intelligent Transmission Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo ZhongDa Leader Intelligent Transmission Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, sale, and service of motor drives, electric machines, and precision reducers in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers permanent magnet DC motors, AC gear motors, smart logistic solutions, planetary gear boxes, robot reducers, and drivers. Its products are used in industrial robots, intelligent logistics, new energy, hoop bending machine, and other fields, as well as food, packaging, textile, electronic, medical, and other special machinery, and equipment industries. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China.
